item.name: User Blocking

request.description: Block a user (Customer or Provider). Disables login and API access.
Unblock a previously blocked user.

response.name: Unblock User
Unblock User

item.description: Admin APIs to manage user access (Block/Unblock).

request.description: Fetch notifications for the logged-in customer.
Fetch notifications for the logged-in provider.
